entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why it won't work on macOS 15.0 #43509
  • Deduplicate NuGet sources provided from NuGet.Config and .NET CLI arguments for tool install #43507

Closed

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #42733
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/6.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43389
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/6.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43390
  • wasmconsole + WasmSingleFileBundle fails on Windows #43505
  • -bl is not working with dotnet run #43310
  • v9 SDK doesn't print nupkg path on `dotnet pack` #43248
  • Props/Targets files from nuget are not imported during Pack execution when multiple frameworks are targetted #43512
  • dotnet ef commands are not finding .NET in nixOS #43467

PullRequests

Created

  • Update to the November release downlevel versions #43523
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update implicit versions for October #43522
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Correctly handle different architectures of the SDK #43521
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Pass official build id props via /p: #43520
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Fix NullReferenceException for `dotnet tool update -g --all` #43516
    Servicing-consider, Area-Tools
  • Add Aspire service tests #43515
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2540600 #43514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • use prerelease version iteration 1 #43513
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Fix legacy package definitions design time builds #43496
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43491
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • [main] Fix the formatting of the onelocbuildconditional #43519
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix the formatting of the onelocbuildconditional #43482
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • ExcludeFromSourceBuild->ExcludeFromSourceOnlyBuild #43477
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Only conditionally do copy steps, as non-existent source throws error #43504
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable stage-2 builds #43439
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Patch for Source-Build Stage 2 FSharp FS0064 Warnings #43436
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Expand EOL list to include net7 6 months after it goes OOS per design #43441
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expand EOL list to include net7 6 months after it goes OOS per design #43440
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Fix NullReferenceException for `dotnet tool update -g --all` #43157
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Clean up some code #42775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the error for targeting net9 in 17.11 #43143
    Servicing-consider, untriaged
  • Correctly handle different architectures of the SDK #43471
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Publish prebuilt reports for each repo #43336
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-SourceBuild
  • Merge the net10 dotnet/runtime and dotnet/aspnetcore codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Unstable branding with rtm label and empty iteration #43483
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add PGO for F# compiler #42514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: also try Basic auth when username is '<token>'. #43354
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
